name: Backyard AR Kicker
description:
Score as many field goals as you can in this exciting football kicker game! Compete against the clock to get your highest score. Use power-ups to increase your score and to rank you higher on the global leaderboard! Choose to play in an augmented reality (AR) or non-AR mode.

KEY FEATURES
• AR & Non-AR Modes
• Arcade and Campaign Modes
• Stars rewarded after every game redeemable for in-game items
• Game records of the player's past games
• Competitive global leaderboard

Check out all the other games from DOD Media Group on the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/developer/dod-media-group/id1303667551?mt=8

Privacy Policy: http://www.dodmediagroup.com/privacy.html

Terms of Service: http://www.dodmediagroup.com/tos.html
